Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Facebook has announced plans to start charging fees to users of the social network. This is not supported by any credible evidence or official statement from Facebook.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no credible evidence or official announcement from Facebook to support the claim.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Facebook will start charging fees to users based on unsubstantiated rumors and hoaxes in the past.
